data.name: Horny Warp: Hentai Fantasy
data.detailed_description:
Make sure to add us to your wishlist!

Introduction


Horny Warp is a game where you take on the role of the savior of a distressed village. Rebuild, play funny minigames and uncover the mysteries of a world you’ve never seen before! The game contains adult content spiced with a pinch of selected humor and beautiful graphics.

Story


Your daily routine is suddenly shattered by a “Summoning Ritual” performed in a foreign realm. They call you the Savior, but ... what will happen next? Your job is to help the villagers alongside six girls and find a way to get back home!

Features


  • Six unique heroines from different worlds;
  • 18 animated adult scenes;
  • Six types of fun minigames;
  • A bunch of fetishes for everyone;
  • A captivating story full of flirtation and humor;
  • Voiced adult scenes;
  • Variable dialogue options;

data.short_description: Welcome to the story, which takes part in the magic medieval realm! Horny Warp is an erotic game with hot sex scenes, visual novel elements, village building, a lot of fun minigames and more! Six unique heroines will keep you company on this adventure and will form a pretty strong bond with you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.14
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 1.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
- Nudity or sexual content
- Not suitable for watching at work
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old
